Houston.University of Texas at Houston Police De:
The University of Texas at Houston Police Department is a full-service Police Department that serves the communities of The University of Texas Health Science Center at Houston and M.D. Anderson Cancer Center. UTPD-Houston patrols the Texas Medical Center and has property in surrounding counties.


== Early History and Foundation ==
The need for a professional police force for the University of Texas became clear after the University of Texas Tower Shooting on August 1, 1966 when Charles Whitman killed 14 people and injured thirty-one on the University of Texas at Austin campus.
